title: CAR MODEL VARIANT overview page Â» Preview IMAGES
user_story:
As a visitor
I want to see a preview image for each CAR MODEL VARIANT on the overview page
So I can quickly find a specific one without knowing its name
description:
* each CAR MODEL VARIANT item on the CAR MODEL VARIANT overview page contains a preview image
* the 'preview image' refers to what is known as 'prime image' in the API
* the preview image is displayed in thumbnail size
* when a CAR MODEL VARIANT has no prime image then the preview image shows the default fallback image
